title: Fathoms to Feet Converter (6 ft & Admiralty 6.08 ft)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: feet = fathoms × fathom_length Standard: feet = fathoms × 6 Admiralty: feet = fathoms × 6.08

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: fathoms = feet ÷ fathom_length Example: 48 ft ÷ 6 = 8 fathoms
